item.title: House Flipper - Dine Out DLC
item.description:
Title: House Flipper - Dine Out DLC
Genre: Casual , Indie , Simulation
Developer: Frozen Way , Empyrean , GameFormatic S.A.
Publisher: Frozen Way , Frozen District , PlayWay S.A.
Franchise: Frozen Way , Frozen District , House Flipper
Release Date: Nov 26, 2024




About This Content

Dine Out DLC will let you get your foot in the door of the restaurant business. It comes with a set of engaging, immersive quests that will allow you to explore and renovate a variety of restaurants, cafes, sushi bars, wine cellars and pizzerias. The DLC also introduces numerous new items, mechanics and other features that will make your House Flipper experience more fun and comfortable.

Let them rent!

House Flipper has always enabled you to buy and sell properties, but now we're unlocking the opportunity for long-term profit making! Choose from residential properties, restaurants, cafes, or offices, and lease your freshly renovated spaces. The rental price depends on the number of rooms, furnishings and the type of property – choose a tenant that suits you and sign the contract.

Universal Cooker - One Click and Ready!

As with previous House Flipper DLCs, Dine Out comes with new tools to play with. One of them is the Universal Cooker – a multifunctional device that will let you spread your wings in the restaurant business both as a flipper and a chef. Have a taste for Thai cuisine? Or maybe you have a soft spot for some Italian classics? Pick and choose from our extensive list of diverse dishes and design the menu of your restaurant. Purchase the ingredients and wait as the magical Universal Cooker does its job! Dishes prepared with the Universal Cooker can be later used as delicious pieces of decor. And if you own our previous add-on (Farm DLC), you can get discounts on some of the dishes depending on the crops you have in your inventory.

More precision to stop collision!

A well-planned and decorated interior and elegant table setting are all factors when it comes to customer satisfaction. If you feel you might need a little help getting the establishment ready for a steady influx of demanding clientele, we recommend you take a look at our new grid measurement system. Buy in bulk and place items exactly where they need to be. The new tool that comes with Dine Out DLC allows you to keep everything as symmetrical as you'd like. Being a perfectionist has never been easier!

Cook up your own style

Make sure your establishment becomes an institution thanks to an iconic restaurant sign. Dine Out DLC comes with a tool that allows you to customize the logo of your restaurant with a plethora of shapes, fonts, colors and patterns. Mix it up, experiment, or keep it simple – there is no single recipe for success.

Key Features

  • 10 engaging and immersive quests

  • 10 houses to renovate and decorate

  • 30 dishes from around the world to prepare

  • Precise and symmetrical object placement on flat surfaces

  • The ability to rent out restaurants, offices and houses

  • The ability to design and build entresol to maximize space and add a touch of modern style.

  • The ability to decorate kitchen tables with tablecloths

  • The ability to design your own advertising and neon signs

  • Over 1350 new items!

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

MacOS

item.title: Gladio Mori
item.description:
Title: Gladio Mori
Genre: Action , Simulation , Early Access
Developer: Plebeian Studio
Publisher: Bonus Stage Publishing , Korgi Digital (China)
Release Date: Nov 26, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Nov 26, 2024




About This Game

Gladio Mori is a physics-driven fighting game that redefines the gladiator arena. Whether playing solo or challenging others in multiplayer battles, you’ll wield razor-sharp weapons and unleash unique moves in brutal, tactical combat. Every decision, swing, and step matters as you carve your path to victory.

Multiplayer

Take on opponents in intense online battles with up to 4 players or enjoy the action locally with split-screen gameplay. Prove your skill and adaptability in every fight as you rise to claim victory in the arena.

Organ-Based Damage System

Forget health bars—combat in Gladio Mori is as brutal as it is precise. Damage to muscles, arteries, and vitals directly impacts your ability to fight:

  • Injured Muscles weaken your strikes.

  • Severed Arteries cause you to bleed out.

  • Pierced Vitals mean instant death.

Precision and strategy are your greatest weapons.

Authentic Weapons and Armor

No magical gear here—just realistic weapons and armor that behave as they should. Plate armor blocks strikes, but exposes weak points. Find openings in your opponent’s defenses or risk being outmatched.

In-Game Move Editor

Unleash your creativity with a fully customizable move editor. Control your character’s physical body to craft unique animations:

  • Design efficient and devastating attacks.

  • Recreate iconic moves from your favorite films or games.

  • Experiment with wild, unpredictable maneuvers—it's up to you.

Community-Created Moves

Not an animator? No problem. Explore movesets shared by other players or mix and match individual moves to create a style that’s entirely yours. The community fuels the creativity in Gladio Mori.

Enter the Arena

Every battle in Gladio Mori is a test of strategy, skill, and ingenuity. Forge your fighting style, exploit weaknesses, and prove your worth in the ultimate arena.

The gladiator's path awaits—are you ready?

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

The game is fairly stylized, but it does include unrealistic but frequent violence.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: 3.5GHz
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

item.title: Claymores of the Lost Kingdom
item.description:
Title: Claymores of the Lost Kingdom
Genre: Indie , RPG , Strategy
Developer: Ultaan Games
Publisher: Ultaan Games
Release Date: Nov 25, 2024




About This Game

Adventure Calls!

  • Forge your own unique playstyle

  • Uncover hidden synergies

  • Set up intricate combos

  • Obliterate your enemies

  • Win against impossible odds!

Stat-based Card Discovery

Level up your character's attributes, and find new cards based exclusively on your unique build!

Deckbuilding Freedom

  • Adaptive, classless deckbuilding system. As you increase your character’s abilities - Strength, Constitution, Dexterity, Wisdom, and Intelligence - new cards and playstyles will emerge

  • 300+ fully unique cards

  • 150+ keywords with multiple damage types, and a huge focus on synergies

  • 50+ item cards

  • 30+ combat-altering spicy status effects

  • 5 main attribute skill trees with cards and additional perks

  • 15 streamlined archetypes and dozens of sub-playstyles

Forge Your Own Class Every Run

  • Pick one of 5 fantasy races with their own starter decks and attribute bonuses

  • Spice things up with 11 character backgrounds, each granting you a special card and an extra attribute modifier

  • Fight for loot, XP, renown, and level up!

  • Discover new cards based on your attributes

Roam the World Map

  • Explore an open world map with 99 locations, and 24 settlements

  • Embark on dangerous side quests such as smuggling supplies in a famine-stricken world

  • Encounter 50+ events with difficult tradeoffs and extra choices based on your unique hero

  • Unlock exclusive world map abilities by committing to your favorite attribute skill tree

  • Fight organized bandits who hoard resources, raid caravans, and pillage settlements

  • Optimize your strategy to hunt down gangs, face challenging elite enemies, and slay their wanted leaders with extra spicy procedural encounter modifiers

Survive, adapt, and save the world from the Harbinger of Doom!

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS *: Windows 8, 10, 11
    • Processor: Yes
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Intel HD
    • DirectX: Version 10
    • Storage: 6 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 11
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM

item.title: Void Crew
item.description:
Title: Void Crew
Genre: Action , Adventure
Developer: Hutlihut Games
Publisher: Focus Entertainment
Franchise: Focus Entertainment
Release Date: Nov 25, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Sep 7, 2023




About This Game



Void Crew is a 1-4 player co-op First Person Space Adventure: Rally your crew, power your spaceship, and get ready for epic space battles, facing chaotic dangers you and your crew never trained for!

In the future, a doctrine of survival unites humanity against a mysterious aggressor - the Hollow. As the chosen ones, it’s up to you as a crew of up to 1-4 mavericks to brave the void and bring order to the galaxy!

Embark on the most advanced spacecrafts ever built, and journey into deep space on thrilling missions that you and your crew absolutely never trained for! Asteroid storms, solar flares and your buddies’ screw-ups will be the least of your worries, as hostile aliens, and desperate human scavengers push your crew to their limits.

CHAOTIC 1 - 4 -PLAYER CO-OP


Pilot the ship, man the turrets, perform emergency repairs, recharge the power cells, utilize space station weaponry, fabricate munitions and exit the ship on extravehicular missions - be it patching the ship hull or scavenging derelict wrecks.

EPIC SPACE BATTLES


Teamwork is key: pick a role and prioritize your most urgent tasks with your crew... or try to do everything at once and just wing it as you’ll be short on reliable manpower!

SHARE AND OPERATE YOUR OWN SPACESHIP


Brute force through thick armor, pierce energy shields, launch missile barrages or snipe weak spots - either way you’ll make sure the enemy ships spin out of control to their destruction - preferably before you blow up! The victor claims the spoils, and you’ll need to scavenge valuable materials to upgrade and face the direst conditions with top notch equipment … and don’t forget to go full fashion victim and customize your character's spacesuit to fly in style and boldly go where you probably shouldn’t have!

  • Team-up as a crew of 1-4 in co-op: Round up your best buddies and you're in for a wild space ride!

  • Your ship, your way to play: With a flexible player role system and on-the-go installable ship systems you’ll be able to switch your strategies faster than a rogue asteroid changes course.

  • Customize and upgrade: Give your character a spiffy new look with rich upgrades, or add more toys to your ship! You'll be the most powerful and stylish crew in the galaxy!





AI Generated Content Disclosure

The developers describe how their game uses AI Generated Content like this:

Pre-generated Text-To-Speech Voice Cloning for the Homunculus AI, where it makes sense creatively.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
    • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 3100 / Intel Core i3-8300
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 6 GB VRAM, AMD Radeon RX 590 / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 7 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: 30 FPS in 1920x1080 | SSD Required
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
    • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3700X / Intel Core i9-10900X
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 8 GB VRAM, AMD Radeon RX 5700 / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 7 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: 60 FPS in 1920x1080 | SSD Required

item.title: Lost But Found
item.description:
Title: Lost But Found
Genre: Casual , Simulation , Strategy
Developer: Rogue Duck Interactive
Publisher: Rogue Duck Interactive
Franchise: RDI Strategy Games
Release Date: Nov 25, 2024




About This Game

Lost But Found is a combination of a job simulator & hidden object-finding game. Your attention to finding the right item passengers need, and managing them in a tidy manner will earn you money!

Gameplay

In a top-down table, you are an officer who collects the lost items in an airport. Organize those items in the table. When people who lost their items request them, see if you have the item, then give it to them.

You are expected to be an honest officer, but there is expensive, tempting items, which you are able to steal and sell in the black market. Lost But Found is filled with little fun mechanics, that will make your role-playing experience fun!

You are expected to make sure every passenger in the airport gets their lost item, when you don't have the item, you have the option to take their contact number, to call them when you find their lost items.

Making money, and buying upgrades to make your job easier in the office is necessary. With the interactive upgrade system, where every item you buy has a function, that will either make your job easier or increase your earnings.

Mechanics

  • Stacking items on the table to make sure you have enough space.

  • Notepad to take down people’s numbers

  • A phone to dial people to take their items.

  • Ability to decide to keep items for yourself.

  • Start your day by helping passengers find their lost items

  • Passengers come to ask for their item

  • if you have it, give it to them

  • If you don’t, take their number and send them on their way

  • If the item comes in another day, call them to come to pick it up and keep it safe for them

Wishlist now!

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

MacOS

Linux
